description: Container for one or multiple ModelDescriptions

anyOf.description: A model describes a real world object and hols attributes.

key.description: A key is an unique identifier overall models in the application.

anyOf.description: A property describes the characteristics of a model respectively entity. The following datatypes are currently supported:

key.description: A key is an unique identifier overall properties in this model.

comparisonType.description: “Textual search” is possible for string-properties and is specified with filter keyword as following. The comparison type describes the behaviour:

anyOf.description: A Field prepresent a list of elements along a explicite dimension.

key.description: A key is an unique identifier overall fields in this model.

filter.description: Filtering the values of the field with or without counting

anyOf.description: Facet calculation is disabled by default

resolve.description: Resolve a Relationship to an foreign model

field.description: The field on the foreign object which should be used for resolve the relation.

model.description: The model of the foreign object field.

derive.description: Properties and Fields can be copied from one model to another. This process is called deriving. To derive a field or a property from modelA to modelB there has to be a connection (singleValued/multiValued Field) between the models.

localField.description: The field on the foreign object which should be used for resolve the relation.

remoteField.description: The field on the foreign object which should be derived.

FilterComparisonType.description: “Textual search” is possible for string-properties and is specified with filter keyword as following. The comparison type describes the behaviour:

FieldType.description:
The type of a field indicates if it contains one (type = "singleValued"") or multiple (type = "multiValued") keys of the foreign model. 
- singleValued contains only one key to an object
- multiValued contains multiple key of objects
